title: WinRM Check
description: A configuration for a check that uses the WinRM protocol.

host.description: The IP or hostname of the host to run the WinRM check against.

username.description: The user to log in to the WinRM server with.

password.description: The password for the user you wish to log in with.

port.description: The TCP port the WinRM server should be listening on.

encrypted.description: Whether to use TLS when connecting to the WinRM server.

cmd.description: A command to execute once the WinRM connection is established.

matchContent.description: Whether the command output must match a defined regex for the check to pass.

contentRegex.description: A regex to be matched by the command output.
